definition: camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: Carnitine is a nutrient that helps the body turn fat into energy.
sentences.chinese: 肉鹼是一種營養，幫助人體脂肪轉化爲能量。

sentences.english: Red edge position (REP, 680-780 nm) has been used for evaluating crop leaves nitrogen status.
sentences.chinese: 紅邊位置常被用於監測作物葉片氮素營養狀況。

sentences.english: Nutrition for Foodservice and Culinary Professionals, Study Guide, 6th Edition.
sentences.chinese: 食品服務和廚房專家所需營養，研究指導，第六版。

sentences.english: The bulk of our nutritional needs come from fruits, vegetables, and grains.
sentences.chinese: 我們所需的營養大部分都來自於水果，蔬菜和穀物。

sentences.english: This is one nutritious spud as it is loaded with vitamin A and vitamin C.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種營養的馬鈴薯富含維生素A和維生素C。

sentences.english: This nutrient superstar is found concentrated in the brightly colored skins and flesh of most foods in their natural form.
sentences.chinese: 該超級營養素在天然果蔬的色彩繽紛的皮肉中很多。

sentences.english: Bachu mushroom has more adapt to soil nutrient.
sentences.chinese: 巴楚蘑菇對土壤營養條件有很強的適應性。

sentences.english: The absorbing amount of nutriment and laminarin from kelp by eating directly by humankind is very little.
sentences.chinese: 人直接食用海帶攝取的營養物質和海帶多糖的量極少。

sentences.english: Its appeal depends as much on the mystique of its origins as its nutritional qualities.
sentences.chinese: 犛牛具有神祕性的產地和營養價值使它充滿魅力。

sentences.english: The avocado shows a typical loss of green color and a reduction in vegetative growth.
sentences.chinese: 鱷梨呈現典型的葉色褪綠及營養生長減弱。

sentences.english: Bottle-feeding lets me know how much nutrition the baby has had.
sentences.chinese: 瓶喂使我知道寶寶到底吸收了多少營養。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a wheat germ nutrient flour and its preparation method.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種麥胚營養粉及其製備方法。

sentences.english: Eutrophication is becoming a serious problem in most of the mariculture areas in China.
sentences.chinese: 當前，中國的多數海水養殖區富營養化相當嚴重。

sentences.english: If there is a dietician guides you to improve your diet habit, would it be healthier than before?
sentences.chinese: 如果有營養師指導你的飲食，會否對你的健康有幫助？

sentences.english: Lu Ding tea, medicinal value and nutrients from the benefit of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 路丁茶從藥用價值與營養元素上造福人類。

sentences.english: Can bate is corneous, send skin depth nutrition at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 能夠軟化角質，同時將營養送入肌膚深層。

definition: to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
